00040 void StringUtilsTest::testCreation()
00041 {
00042         StringUtils *utils = new StringUtils;
00043         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( utils != NULL );
00044         delete utils;
00045 }

00047 void StringUtilsTest::testmethod_STLTrimLeft()
00048 {
00049         std::string s1("---Hello---");
00050         std::string s2("   Goodbye   ");
00051         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s1);
00052         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == "---Hello---");
00053         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s2, '-');
00054         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == "   Goodbye   ");
00055         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s1, '-');
00056         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == "Hello---");
00057         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s2);
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == "Goodbye   ");
00059 }
00060 
00061 void StringUtilsTest::testmethod_STLTrimRight()
00062 {
00063         std::string s1("---Hello---");
00064         std::string s2("   Goodbye   ");
00065         StringUtils::STLTrimRight(s1);
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == "---Hello---");
00067         StringUtils::STLTrimRight(s2, '-');
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == "   Goodbye   ");
00069         StringUtils::STLTrimRight(s1, '-');
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == "---Hello");
00071         StringUtils::STLTrimRight(s2);
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == "   Goodbye");
00073 }

00075 void StringUtilsTest::testmethod_STLTrimLeft_wide_version()
00076 {
00077         std::wstring s1(L"---Hello---");
00078         std::wstring s2(L"   Goodbye   ");
00079         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s1);
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == L"---Hello---");
00081         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s2, '-');
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == L"   Goodbye   ");
00083         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s1, '-');
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == L"Hello---");
00085         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(s2);
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == L"Goodbye   ");
00087 }

00089 void StringUtilsTest::testmethod_STLTrimRight_wide_version()
00090 {
00091         std::wstring s1(L"---Hello---");
00092         std::wstring s2(L"   Goodbye   ");

00097         StringUtils::STLTrimRight(s1, '-');
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s1 == L"---Hello");

00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s2 == L"   Goodbye");

00118 void StringUtilsTest::testmethod_FormatString()
00119 {
00120         wchar_t buffer[64];
00121         int count = 64;
00122         int value = 101;
00123         FormatString1(buffer, count, L"%d", value);
00124         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::wstring(buffer) == L"101");
00125 
00126         int min=0;
00127         int max=100;
00128         FormatString2(buffer, count, L"[%d..%d]", min, max);
00129         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::wstring(buffer) == L"[0..100]");
00130 
00131         int a=0;
00132         int b=1;
00133         int c=2;
00134         FormatString3(buffer, count, L"%d%d%d", a, b, c);
00135         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::wstring(buffer) == L"012");
00136 
00137         int d=3;
00138         FormatString4(buffer, count, L"%d%d%d%d", a, b, c, d);
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::wstring(buffer) == L"0123");
00140 
00141         int e=4;
00142         FormatString5(buffer, count, L"%d%d%d%d%d", a, b, c, d, e);
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(std::wstring(buffer) == L"01234");
00144 }
00145 
00146 void StringUtilsTest::testmethod_ToString()
00147 {
00148         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(StringUtils::ToString(1, 2, '0') == L"01");
00149         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(StringUtils::ToString(1, 3, '0') == L"001");
00150         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(StringUtils::ToString(1000, 3, '0') == L"1000");
00151 }
